p: The drug-likeness properties of the standard drugs and selected medicinal plant bioactives were screened using Lipinskiâ€™s rule of five (RO5; http://www.scfbio-iitd.res.in/software/drugdesign/lipinski.jsp; Lipinski, 2004). Additional drug-likeness features, including lipophilicity, solubility and the drug-likeness score of the ligands were obtained using OSIRIS Property Explorer ( https://www.organic-chemistry.org/prog/peo/) and the SWISSADME server ( http://www.swissadme.ch/; Daina et al., 2017).
